In a fair and democratic society the people of this country should have a right to be heard.

E-petitions are a good way for members of the community to be heard but if that concern which is submitted in an epetition is rejected by those responsible for managing this system then there should be an appeals procedure. I have a voice and i want my voice heard.

I submitted a fair and frank epetition concerning the conduct of politicians and the epetition was rejected and i can't see why. My epetition stated that if a member of parliament was found to have lied or been untruthful in anyway then they should be removed from public office.

This epetition is for the right to have an appeal procedure in the event of an epetition being rejected.
